com.jgefroh.core

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgefroh.core.Core

  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    The heart of the Core framework.

    It also provides timing methods and very basic message passing for inter-system communication.

    Author:
    Joseph Gefroh
    See Also:
    IInfoPack, IComponent

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(IEntity entity)
        Begins tracking the passed IEntity.
        An ID is generated for entities without a preset ID.
        IInfoPacks are updated with this entity.

        entity -

      • updateInfoPacks

        public void updateInfoPacks(IEntity entity)
        Updates all tracked IInfoPack with the given entity. The entity will be tracked by any IInfoPack objects that it can use
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to update the packs with

      • isTime

        public boolean isTime(long now,
             long last,
             long waitTime)
        Checks to see if the desired amount of time has passed.
        Parameters:
        now - the current time, in ms
        last - the time of last execution, in ms
        waitTime - the time to wait, in ms
        Returns:
        true if the wait time has passed; false otherwise
